description.en: Public sector. Public services. Stakeholders in the context of public service development. Public services design. Co-operation and service co-creation with private sector and non-governmental organisations.
description.et: Avalik sektor. Avalikud teenused. Huvigrupid avalike teenuste kontekstis. Avalike teenuste disain. Koostöö erasektori ja MTÜ-dega avalike teenuste loomisel.

objectives.en: Subject gives overview of how public sector functions, course outlines the main model how to develop public services and how public service development differs from private sector service development. The course also gives an overview about the possibilities for public sector to cooperate and co-create the services with private sector and nongovernmental sector.
objectives.et: Aine annab ülevaate avaliku sektori toimimise kesksematest põhimõtetest, avalike teenuste arendamise eripäradest ning põhimõtetest, kuidas avalik sektor saab teha koostööd avalike teenuste arendamisel erasektoriga ning kodanikeühendustega.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon the completion of the course the student:
1) knows the fundamental principles of public sector and its impact on public services and service development;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) teab avaliku sektori toimimise üldpõhimõtteid ja selle mõju teenuste arendamisele ja pakkumisele;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) understands the special properties of service development in public sector;
3) knows the principles of developing public services in co-operatio with other public, private and non-governmental organisations;
learning_outcomes.et: 3) teab avalike teenuste pakkumise põhimõtteid era-, avaliku- ning mittetulundusliku sektori koostöös;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) is able to develop public services.
